title: The VFL Grand Final, 1970: 4th quarter [Carlton v Collingwood]
brief_description: Last quarter of the 1970 VFL Grand Final between Carlton and Collingwood. Record crowd of 121,696 attended this memorable grand final. Commentary team including Tony Charlton.
